name: Operation: Fallen Eagle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB) / AMD Radeon R9 380 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 (6 GB) / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
